suncertify.client
Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.client.ClientController

public final class ClientController
extends java.lang.Object

Controller for the client component of the application.

The controller provides methods for each use case of the client: listing all records, searching for records by name and/or location and booking a record.

The controller works as an adapter between the business interface and the client view. It calls the methods on a BusinessInterface object that actually provides the business method implementations and wraps the result in a ClientModel instance.

Constructor Summary
ClientController(BusinessService businessService)
          Creates a new ClientController instance that uses the specified BusinessService instance to provide the use cases.

searchRecords

public ClientModel searchRecords(java.lang.String name,
                                 java.lang.String location)
Returns a model containing the data of all data records that exactly match the specified criteria.

A criteria value of null matches any field value.

Parameters:
name - Criteria for the name field
location - Criteria for the location field
Returns:
model containing the data records that exactly match the criteria

bookRecord

public ClientModel bookRecord(DataRecord record,
                              ClientModel model)
                       throws RecordAlreadyBookedException,
                              RecordNotFoundException
Tries to book the record with the specified record number.

Throws a RecordAlreadyBookedException if the record was already booked.

Parameters:
record - data record that shall be booked.
model - model currently used in the view
Returns:
model updated model
Throws:
RecordAlreadyBookedException - if the record was already booked.
RecordNotFoundException - if no record with the given record number exists or if it is marked as deleted
